channel.itunes:subtitle: Beetle Talk for Volkswagen Beetlemania

channel.itunes:summary: General discussion about Volkswagen Beetle in Thailand

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 117. mini gathering outside of Bangkok, VDO Version
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud, Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: จากตอนที่แล้วเป็นเสียง คราวนี้มีเป็นวิดิโอสั้นๆ ครับ ก็ถือเป็นการแนะนำตัวสมาชิกชาวบางบอนกันนะครับ เพื่อนๆ ที่อยากร่วมแจมก็สามารถติดตามข่าวได้ที่กระทู้ในเวบ TVC ได้นะครับ เจอกันครับชาวบางบอน ฝั่งธน ครับ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 116. mini gathering outside of Bangkok
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud, Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: สวัสดีพี่น้องทุกท่าน กลับมาแล้วหลังจาก 8 เดือนผ่านไปครับ ตอนนี้เป็นเสียงครับ อัดโดยวิธีโบราณมาก คุณภาพอาจจะไม่แจ่มเท่าไหร่แต่ผมว่าได้ฟีลดีครับก็เช่นเดิมนัดกัน กว่าจะลงตัวก็กินเวลาหลายอาทิตย์ครับ เมื่อเจอกันก็ขออัดเสียงสนทนากันไว้ฟังเพลินๆเผื่อเป็นประโยชน์บ้าง เฮฮา บ้างครับ เชิญรับฟังครับ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 115. 1969 VW Eco by Sim
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Sim, Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Sim, a long-time listener, drove his newly-acquired VW to show us. It's a 1969 VW, Eco model. In order to spice things up, Aey invited Guy over to co-host the program.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 114. Ratchada Night Market
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: น้องอ๊อด น้องกายย์ และเอ๋ ไปเดินรัชดาไนท์กันหลังจากว่าจะๆ มาน๊านนนนนนน นาน.... ในที่สุดก็ได้ไปซะทีปรากฏว่าเขาจะเลิกกันแล้วไปเป็นอะไรตามดูในรายการนะครับ อิๆ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 113. VW Party at Chiangmai
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: เมื่อวันที่ 24 เมษา ไปทำงานที่เชียงใหม่เย็นๆน้องทอมมี่บอกมีงานก็ขอติดรถไปด้วยเจอเพื่อนๆหลายๆ คนเก็บภาพมาฝากนิดหน่อยครับแก้คิดถึงกันครับ เชียงใหม่รถโฟล์คสวยๆเยอะครับ เอาเป็นว่าชมภาพได้เลยครับ โปรดติดตามตอนต่อไป.....
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 112. Chan Garage, Chiangmai
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: It's been a while since the previous episode that the duo claimed that they would be back. Two months for an episode, that was hardly a regular program, was it? Anyway, Guy and Aey took us to visit a VW service center in Chiangmai on this episode.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 111. Come Back
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: After a long period of absence, the duo are back. This time, though, they were interviewed by a group of listeners about Khui Kui Tao. This was recorded at Weerayut's home. We also would like to promote the listeners' website, http://rustbugs.blogspot.com.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 110. T2 by T3
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: อยู่มาวันหนึ่งน้องกายย์โทรมาชวนไปบอกว่ามีการพบปะกันในระหว่างกลุ่มผู้ใช้โฟล์คตู้รุ่นทรานสปอร์ตเต้อร์ (T3) แล้วมีเซอไพร้สนิดหน่อย เอ้าไปกัน กายย์พาไปพบพี่อ้วนกำลังก้มๆเงยๆอ้อ... มีสมาชิกใหม่นี่เองเป็น T2 (อะไรเอ่ย?) ก็จัดแจงพาตัวไปที่วังท่านจิมมี่ย่านประเวศ หลังจากนั้นก็คุยๆๆๆๆๆ ผมก็เก็บบรรยากาศมาเรื่อยๆครับกลายมาเป็นตอนนี้เนื้อหาก็ชิวๆครับลองชมครับ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 109. 1975 Super Beetle by Aud
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: สวัสดีครับพ่อ แม่ พี่น้อง เพื่อน มิตรรัก แฟนๆรายการ กลับมาแล้วครับ... ห่าง หายหน้าจอไปนานเนื่องจากทั้งเอ๋และยุทธ มีภาระกิจอันใหญ่หลวง จึงหายหน้าหายตาไปบ้างครับ เอาละมาว่ากันตอนนี้สักหน่อย เป็นตอนต่อเนื่องจาก ตอนที่ 105 นะครับ ตอนนี้เป็นตอนที่น่าสนใจ เวลาชมลองเปิดตอน 105 ไปด้วยจะได้เกร็ดความรู้ในรุ่น ซุปเปอร์สตาร์มากขึ้นครับ ในช่วงสงกรานต์ที่ผ่านมา ทางรายการขอสวัสดีปีใหม่ไทย ย้อนกลังสักนิดครับ อิๆ เอ้าเชิญชมกันดีกว่าครับ ฮิ้วววววว....
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 108. DIY, Changing Spark Plug Wires
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Boonsong VW garage is back. Aey managed to get Boonsong to show us how to do-it-yourself on changing spark plug wire.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 107. Visiting Doi VW Garage, Chiangmai
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: A lady friend would like to own a Beetle, so Guy did her a favor by taking her for a tour at a VW Garage in Chaingmai with Aey as the producer and camera man. The garage is Doi Garage, and we would like to thank them for the courtesy of letting us record an episode there.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 106. A Conversation at Dokrak
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Rasit Thongdhanee, Guy and their gang
item.itunes:summary: While waiting for Tommy to show up at the shop, Aeng and friends talked, as usual, about their cars. Since they were all VW fanatics, so it was only natural to record this as a KKT episode. At the end, Tommy never showed up.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 105. A New Look for 1974 Beetle from Aud (again)
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Aud and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Since appearing on episode 9, Aud had made some changed to his 1974 Beetle and showed us here. This time, Aey was the host.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 104. T3 DBC Syncro and a New Owner
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Tuei, Pat and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: This was supposed to be episode 103 because it was a direct continuation from episode 102. After the auction, we talked to the new owner of the car. A big thank to Pat (PPP) for hosting the episode for us and, also, Tuei for giving us an interview.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 103. Why These Brands?
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Tommy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: With some pre-arrangement, Guy, from Krabi, Aey, from Chiangmai, and Yut managed to meeting in Bangkok. Running out of topics as well as time, they picked the common issue of why they had to buy these brands to go along with their cars.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 102 Bidding for T3 DBC 4WD
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Pat, Tommy and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: The program went missing for a few weeks, simply because Aey no longer had a computer to produce it. The old one was too old and we just could not afford a new one for him. Somehow he managed to get this episode out. This episode was shot at a car auction in Chiangmai, and Pat was bidding for a VW bus. So you could see the before-, during- and after-atmospheres of the process.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 101. Why dual carburators?
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Weerayut Suwanthaveesri and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Finally, they have reached the century-mark episode and were having a really good time along the way. They were in Chiangmai with a listener, Tommy. Too bad, Guy and Aod could not join the recording. Instead of talking about new issues, they re-visited old episodes and cherished the memory. It was obvious that they were on their way to heaven that night.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 100. Ha Ha
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Tommy, Weerayut Suwanthaveesri and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Finally, they have reached the century-mark episode and were having a really good time along the way. They were in Chiangmai with a listener, Tommy. Too bad, Guy and Aod could not join the recording. Instead of talking about new issues, they re-visited old episodes and cherished the memory. It was obvious that they were on their way to heaven that night.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 99. What Topic?
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Rasit Thongdhanee and the Gang
item.itunes:summary: Right after recording episode 98, all went in for another recording. They jumped from topics to topics, with Jin and Dear joining the conversation with Tommy as the moderator and Aey as producer as usual.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 98. 1966 Australia VW Bus by John
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: Aey is now working in Chiangmai so we may be seeing more and more VW in Chiangmai. In this episode, our old guest, Tommy, took Aey to visit his friend, John, who was the proud owner of 1966 VW bus from Australia. Because of the rain, the video was somewhat short.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 97. Goto Phuket 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: จากความเดิมตอนที่แล้ว จบลงในเช้ามืดวันที่ 11 สค. เมื่อหนุ่มๆตื่นมาก็ดำเนินกิจกรรมกันต่อ มีกิจกรรมอะไรบ้างก็เชิญชมกันเลยครับ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 96. Goto Phuket 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: กล่าวสวัสดีอีกครั้งครับท่านผู้ชมทุกท่าน ตอนนี้ผมชอบจังน้องกายเดินทางลงใต้กับน้องแพทด้วยรถตู้คันล่าสุด เป็นบรรยากาศในการขับรถที่ชื่นชอบกับผู้ที่ชื่นชอบรถแบบเดียวกัน โดยภาระกิจหลักๆคือการร่วมงานประเพณีของกลุ่มโฟล์คที่จังหวัดภูเก็ตในการ ทำบุญประจำปีครับในวันแม่แห่งชาติ ช่วงนี้ก็เป็นการสนทนาระหว่างน้องกายกับน้องแพทครับ สาระรึ? ไม่มีครับ ฮ่าๆ เชิญชมครับโหลดๆๆ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 95. VW Bus 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: The KKT gang managed to get the VW bus fanatic group to join the conversation. Because of his high spirit, Aey still managed to join via MSN because he was in Chiangmai. As usual, because of the large crowd, the conversation dragged on and had to be divided into 2 episodes. Here was the second part.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 94. VW Bus 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: The KKT gang managed to get the VW bus fanatic group to join the conversation. Because of his high spirit, Aey still managed to join via MSN because he was in Chiangmai. As usual, because of the large crowd, the conversation dragged on and had to be divided into 2 episodes. Here was the first part.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 93. VW Service Shop/Garage at Lopburi
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: From the same trip as shown in Episode 92, Guy and Aud visited a local VW garage at Lopburi, presumably one of the oldest in Lopburi.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 92. Lobburi Trip, part 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Khui Kui Tao Gang
item.itunes:summary: Guy, Aud, Weerayut and Aey arranged a trip to Lobburi with their fans. Turned out to be quite an impressive trip.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 91. Alternative Energy
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Weerayut Suwanthaveesri and Rasit Thongdhanee
item.itunes:summary: Due to energy crisis, the three were trying hard to find an optimum alternative. There were a few ideas in the discussion, some were applicable overseas and some might work in Thailand.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 90. Mini-meeting at I wash happy, part 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy
item.itunes:summary: Part 2 from the previous episode.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 89. Mini-meeting at I wash happy on June 29, 2008
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy
item.itunes:summary: กลับมาแล้วครับเมื่อปลายเดือนที่แล้ว 29 มิย. 2551 ได้มีงานรวมโฟล์คเล็กงานหนึ่งเกิดจากการที่คุณอมรและคุณโต้งซึ่งเปิด car detailing อยากจะพบปะเพื่อนก็เลยเปิดกระทู้เชิญเพื่อนๆชาว VW คุยคุ้ยเต่าเราก็ไปเช่นกันที่ไหนมีเต่าเราจะไป 5555 ไปถึงก็โอโหรถมาเยอะไม่ใช่ มินิ มีตติ้ง เลยนะนี่ก็เลยถ่ายๆๆๆๆ เจอเพื่อนๆเยอะ รถสวยๆแยะ งานนี้น้องกายลุยเดี่ยวเลย 555 ก็จากความยาวที่อัดมาเลยต้องขอแบ่งเป็น 2 ตอน คุยกันแซวกันสนุกสนานเลยครับ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 88. Phuket VW Club
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy and Toang
item.itunes:summary: Part 2, from the previous episode. Guy managed to arrive in Phuket safely and met the local VW club. There were a few of them there, so we made this a photo episode to show some nice VW there.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 87. On the Way to Phuket
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy and Toang
item.itunes:summary: This was the first episode that Yut and Aey took a backseat. Guy produced the whole show for this one. He went to Phuket on a Cal-look VW from Toang (CCK). This episode was recorded along the way on a mobile phone. They discussed about how they went about modifying their VWs and, also, the purpose of their Phuket trip.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 86. Driving in the Rain
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: สวัสดีครับ อิ..ฮิ้วววววว..... กลับมาอาทิตย์นี้เรามาคุยกันต่อเกี่ยวกับอากาศที่มันบ๊องๆ ของเมืองไทยกันดีก่า.. ก็ฝนตกนั่นละครับเด๋วนี้คาดเดาไม่ได้เอาเสียเลย บางจุดใน กทม. ตกซะน้ำท่วม เวลาน้ำท่วมโฟล์คอย่างเราจะกลัวน้ำท่วมไหมน้อ...?? เลย..ลองเอาประสบการณ์ในการลุยน้ำท่วมมาฝากกัน เผื่อว่าจะช่วยได้สำหรับเพื่อนๆที่ไม่เคยลุยน้ำท่วมครับ เรา ๓ คน นั่งสุมหัวพร้อม..อึกๆ.. คุยคุ้ยหาวิธีเตรียมรับน้ำท่วมกัน หากต้องลุยจริงๆนะ อิๆๆ อ่าครับหากว่าใครมีไอเดียดีๆ ก็สามารถโพสที่เวบบอด คุยคุ้ยเต่าได้เลย นะจ๊ะ... [url]http://changkhui.com/smf/index.php?board=6.0[/url] มาแชร์ไอเดียกันได้ครับ โย้วๆ
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 85. Overheat Engine
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: More of a questions-and-answers episode. Guy, Yut and Aey discussed on the most frequently-asked questions such as overheat engine and intermittent engine stop. Most of the time, these questions were asked by newbies in VW. You would have to admire the three since they still enjoyed answering these questions.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 84. Being Nostalgic 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: Another trip down the old memory lane. These two must have missed the old gathering place at Ratchdamnuen square, around King Rama V statue on Saturday night. They talked about this from time to time. On this trip they had guy joining, talking about a new gathering place at Laksi square. Guy and Aey had been there and really enjoyed the crowd. Some notable mentions were khun LAVA and khun Kee Ma, who were the designated host for the gathering.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 83. VW Bus part 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Pat, Tum Type2, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: No explanation needed. This was a direct continuation from the previous episode. We started from how to tell which was Code Type 26.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 82. VW Bus part 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok

item.itunes:summary: We were able to meet 2 Guru in VW Bus; one was khun Tum (tumtype2), who worked in the USA but was in Bangkok during the time, and Pat, http://www.thaivwclub.com webmaster. This was one of more serious discussion ones. The conversation was quite long, so we divided into 2 episodes. The first part was about the origin of VW Bus and characteristics of each annual release.

item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: Aey was in Chiangmai for his business and able to meet with Tommy, the proud owner of 1980 Brazil VW. The car had seen its better days and was obviously ready for a painting job. Towards the end of the clip, Pat also joined the discussion. A big applaud to Aey, who appeared to take his video camera everywhere.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 80. Workshop 1 - Changing Engine Oil
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: This was supposedly the KKT 79th episode, but due to the post-production process, we launched this three weeks late. The VW fanatic duo went literally under the hood and the car to demonstrate how to change the engine oil by yourself. It was fun to record and twice as funny to watch. However, we beg your pardon for our somewhat vulgar language. We were enjoying ourselves so much that we forgot that we would be airing this.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.title: Khui Kui Tao: 79. Workshop 1 - How to Clean Air-filter
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: A recorded episode from our first workshop at Nong Aog's place, using Guy's car. It was fun and enjoyable for those who wehnt. We managed to record two episodes from the day, one on how to change engine oil and the others is how to clean air-filter. This episode was meant to be episode 80, since it was recorded later, but due to Aey's commitment to a trip to Chiangmai, he had to do a quick job of producing the shorter episode as time permitted. The next one should be quite a long one.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Changkhui

item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: From a post at Bangkok Classic Car webboard, Yut was somewhat intrigued about the it. He had doubts about some issues, but overall, it was an interesting post. So Aey and he discussed about the issues. All were about misconception in everyday driving-and-maintenance etiquette, rather than buying a car. Two must have enjoyed the conversation as on this episode, they only managed to cover the first 15 issues. And on this episode, they managed to finish them all.

item.itunes:subtitle: Guy, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: น้องกายยังคงเล่าต่อเนื่องจากเทปที่แล้ว คราวนี้มีประเด็นว่าจากประสบการณ์ทำงานของน้องกายเกี่ยวกับเรื่องอุบัติเหตุทางรถยนต์ น้องกายมีข้อคิดเห็นข้อมูลที่น่าสนใจครับ ว่าเวลาเกิดอุบัติเหตุควรจัดการอย่างไรมีขั้นตอนปฏิบัติตามกฏหมายอย่างไร? และเล่าภาพรวมของกระบวนการทางกฏหมาย เป็นประโยชน์มากๆครับ สามารถนำไปใช้กับรถยนต์ทุกยี่ห้อนะครับ ฟังดูครับ ตอนนี้ ถะหนาดสี แนะนำอย่างแรง แม้ว่าเชลล์ไม่เคยมาฟัง แต่คุยคุ้ยเต่ารับรองคุณภาพ โดย เอ๋และยุทธ การันตี ความเข้มให้ครับ เอิ๊กๆๆ โหลดเลยครับ ...

item.itunes:subtitle: Aud, Yut and Aey
item.itunes:summary: Yut and Aey invited an old guest, Aud, to join a discussion. They exchanged the experience in driving in rainy season, with some hard-to-forget experience.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 30: 1972 Beetle by Soiy
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of 1972 Beetle with Yut and Aey' comments
item.itunes:summary: By cheer co-incident, a guest turned up at our place, so Aey did not waste his time, grabbed all the neccessary gears and told the producer to take care of the camera and record this episode. The car was a '72 Beetle, which had seen its better day but was still in great condition for daily use. Yut and Aey then discussed about the car, as well as enjoying their beer.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, 1972 Beetle

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 29: Gasohol
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aey on the use of gasohol
item.itunes:summary: Due to technical reason, we had to release an audio episode this week. Yut and Aey discussed the practicality of using gasohol on Beetles. Aey had been using it since it was introduced, while Yut still waited until he had no other option.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Gasohol

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 28: 1964 Beetle by Aey, part 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of 1964 Beetle part 2
item.itunes:summary: No introduction needed. This is the 1964 VW Beetle from Aey.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, 1964 Beetle

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 27: 1964 Beetle by Aey, part 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of 1964 Beetle part 1
item.itunes:summary: Lady driver for a change. Yut and Aey found an owner who just refurnished the whole car. It was in superb condition. On this episode, we discussed how she acquired the car and how she got interested in Beetle.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, 1964 Beetle

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 26: Installing Air-conditioning in Beetles
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng on recommending alloy wheels
item.itunes:summary: Aey has been suffering from heat for the last few months, his beetle's air-conditioning was not working. So Yut and Aey revisited the old topic of installing air-conditioning in beetle; pros and cons and some ideas.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 25: Alloy Wheels
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng on recommending alloy wheels
item.itunes:summary: Alloy wheels and Beetles. The two provided quite a few recommendations and comments when ones consider changing to alloy wheels. There were quite a few lessons here, for example, the problem when ones had to face when changing to 17-inch wheels, such as a much bigger steering curve, requirement of a bigger engine.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 24: Thailand Motor Show in the Old Days
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Nostalic feeling of the annual motor show event
item.itunes:summary: One of the oldest, if not the oldest, annual automobile exhibitions in the country, this is the Thiland Motor Show. And the most favourite event for Aey's is the car rally. This is a nostalgic episode, Yut and Aey told the story about how the events were like in the old days.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Thailand Motor Show

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 23: Engine Oil Recommendations
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng commented on their preferences in selecting engine oil.
item.itunes:summary: You really have to admire these two, who can really find a topic to talk about. This time they talked about engine oil that they used for their VWs, and their recommendation in selecting one. One thing that really stood out from their discussion was that they really shared their experiences and they were all first-hand. Bear in mind, though, that this was really their personal opinions, rather than proper lab testing results.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, engine oil

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 22: Points to Ponder on Getting a VW
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng commented on Posts at Various Webboards
item.itunes:summary: Browsing through various webboards, a pattern emerged, the common question seemed to be that what should be taken into consideration when acquiring a VW. Yut and Aey recommended a few tips, what to look for and pitfalss for new VW fanatics.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 21: VW Annual Event in Summary
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng on stage
item.itunes:summary: This was a summary of the VW event on Satruday February 27, at Wonderland. It was a very enjoyable event for the VW fanatics. There were a few fun competition, and flea markets for VW parts. Too bad, our camera did not work properly, so we could not show you the picture, but we summarized the whole event here.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 20.5: Scence from Bangkok Classic event
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of the Bangkok Classic event
item.itunes:summary: Many varieties of classic car here. Have a look
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Bangkok Classic

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 20: at Bangkok Classic fair
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut and Aeng on stage
item.itunes:summary: As promised, this was the audio recording from the event on Saturday January 27, 2007 by the Bangkok Classic fair (http://www.bangkokclassiccar.com). The duo were invited to conduct a program on stage. They, along with khun Ake (from the Bangkok Classic team), dicussed about classic car lovers in general, what habits they had in commmon, etc. We also put the VDO on our site, it was a huge file, 220MB, so we decided to put just the audio file in here. You can download the VDO from our site.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive, Bangkok Classic Car

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 19: Events and Common problems in VW, part 3
item.itunes:author: Yut and Aeng
item.itunes:subtitle: Common problems for newbies part 3
item.itunes:summary: Well, things did not turned out as planned. Yes, we did go to the Bangkok Classic fair but, due to technical reason, we could not produce the VDO tape in time. Hopefully, we could show you the tape next week. As for this week, we had some news about up-and-coming events. One of guests, Aod, would be organizing a meeting on Saturday February 10 for VW near Buddha Monthon area and the annual VW gathering event at the end of February. This week, we talked about when our cars were overheated; the cause and what to do. If you would like to post any comment, you might want to do it at our forums at http://www.changkhui.com/smf
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 18: How to Set Carburator
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of Boonsong VW Service Center
item.itunes:summary: Going technical this time. The two went to khun Boonsong to show us some tips and tricks about how to set carburator by yourself. This should not be too hard, it could be something that can save your car in the future. Also, he showed us some rare tricks that you did not get to see these days, though it was confirmed by khun Durian that it was documented in some technical books 20 years ago.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 17: 1966 Beetle by Guy, part 2
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of 1966 Beetle part 2
item.itunes:summary: As a contiunation from the previous episode, Guy showed us his car. Since Guy was a relatively-new VW owner, Aeng gave him a few tips here and there. Don't forget, we always welcome any one who wants to share his or her car on the program. Just visit us at http://www.changkhui.com and drop us a few lines. Thank you.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: KhuiKuiTao 16: 1966 Beetle by Guy, part 1
item.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
item.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of 1966 Beetle
item.itunes:summary: We had a discussion with a policeman, and it's about a Beetle. This is one of our fan who would like to get comments from the two, so they met and recorded this podcast. It's lengthy interview and display, so we put in here the interview and the car would be on display next week.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 15: Common problems in VW, part 2
item.itunes:author: Yut and Aeng
item.itunes:subtitle: Common problems for newbies part 2
item.itunes:summary: The two finished the conversation about the common problem in VW, faced by newbies. They also told how they solved the problem. This was a very technical as well as educational.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 14: Common problems in VW, part 1
item.itunes:author: Yut and Aeng
item.itunes:subtitle: Common problems for newbies part 1
item.itunes:summary: Back to basic this time! The two discussed about common problems that newbies in VW usually faced. This was the first technical episode, and it was really quite technical. They discussed about the cause when VW would not start and how to go about finding a solution. The discussion was an in-depth coverage and they had to extend it to another episode.
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.itunes:summary: We had an opportunity to see Pat's VW again. This time, it's a VW bus, our first episode on it. This was still a work-in-progress, as you could see on the clip. However, it still showed how much passion Pat had on the car as we could see the detailed restoration on the clip. Thanks Pat for showing us his VW. You may contact him at Pat@hospital2000.com
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: Khui Kui Tao 12: That Driving Feeling
item.itunes:author: Yut and Aeng
item.itunes:subtitle: Yut, Aeng and Aod described that feel-good atmosphere when they drove.
item.itunes:summary: Hard to believe it is Yut and Aey's 12th episode already! This episode was recorded on Nov. 29. and this time, they both came back to talk about their Beetle experinences. The topic of conversation was "How to drive your Beetle and be happy". They had also invited Nong Aod as their first guest on the show to join in the fun.The sound quality was still not quite there, but that's how we liked it - raw and spontaneous. So enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: Thai Podcast, Beetle, Volks, Volkswagen, Car, Automotive

item.title: The Volks Passion
item.itunes:author: Yut and Aeng
